title: "Rumble" font name? Comic horror-like font? PLEASE?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417090340im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rumble_3476.png)

I've been trying to find this font for a long time, but no one seems to know x). I need your help, please.
author: veronicamcs

comments.content: What's the source? If it's from an actual comic book, the vast majority of sound effects are still hand-lettered, and my guess is that this has been, too, considering the soft counters that look potentially inked, the varied letter sizes, etc.

It's from a manga, but this scanlation group translated it, so I thought that maybe it could be a font.

[http://www.titaniascans.com/reader/content/Akatsuki%20no%20Yona/051%3A%2...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417090340/http:/www.titaniascans.com/reader/content/Akatsuki%20no%20Yona/051%3A%20Entranced/akatsuki9_099.png "http://www.titaniascans.com/reader/content/Akatsuki%20no%20Yona/051%3A%20Entranced/akatsuki9\_099.png") (Bigger size)  
 [http://www.titaniascans.com/reader/content/Akatsuki%20no%20Yona/051%3A%2...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417090340/http:/www.titaniascans.com/reader/content/Akatsuki%20no%20Yona/051%3A%20Entranced/akatsuki9_105.png "http://www.titaniascans.com/reader/content/Akatsuki%20no%20Yona/051%3A%20Entranced/akatsuki9\_105.png") (Where it's written "Eek" I guess it's the same font too.)  
 [http://www.titaniascans.com/reader/content/Akatsuki%20no%20Yona/051%3A%2...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417090340/http:/www.titaniascans.com/reader/content/Akatsuki%20no%20Yona/051%3A%20Entranced/akatsuki9_100.png "http://www.titaniascans.com/reader/content/Akatsuki%20no%20Yona/051%3A%20Entranced/akatsuki9\_100.png") (Also here, "gyah" it's the same font.
